name: The Alchemist's Request
description: A reclusive alchemist needs rare ingredients found only in the treacherous Whispering Woods. He promises a potent reward for your troubles.

roundDescriptions.1: You enter the Whispering Woods. Sunlight struggles to pierce the dense canopy. Strange plants twist around ancient trees.
roundDescriptions.2: A territorial beast guards the patch of Moonpetal Flowers the alchemist requires. It doesn't look friendly.
roundDescriptions.3: With the ingredients secured, you must navigate back through the woods as dusk falls and unseen things stir in the shadows.

allActions.label: Charm a Local Dryad for Help
